mapper.insert: insert into employer (employer_id, employer_name, employer_age, employer_phone, employer_redidential_address, employer_birthday, employer_gender, employer_contact_address, employer_job_number, employer_unsettled_wages, employer_wages_settled, total_order_amount, skill1, skill2, skill3, engaging_services, employer_img, emoliyer_salary) values (#{employerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employerName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{employerAge,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{employerPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{employerRedidentialAddress,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{employerBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{employerGender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{employerContactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employerJobNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employerUnsettledWages,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{employerWagesSettled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalOrderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{skill1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skill2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skill3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engagingServices,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emoliyerSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update employer set employer_name = #{employerName,jdbcType=CHAR}, employer_age = #{employerAge,jdbcType=CHAR}, employer_phone = #{employerPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, employer_redidential_address = #{employerRedidentialAddress,jdbcType=CHAR}, employer_birthday = #{employerBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, employer_gender = #{employerGender,jdbcType=CHAR}, employer_contact_address = #{employerContactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employer_job_number = #{employerJobNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employer_unsettled_wages = #{employerUnsettledWages,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, employer_wages_settled = #{employerWagesSettled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_order_amount = #{totalOrderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, skill1 = #{skill1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill2 = #{skill2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill3 = #{skill3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engaging_services = #{engagingServices,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employer_img = #{employerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emoliyer_salary = #{emoliyerSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where employer_id = #{employerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select employer_id, employer_name, employer_age, employer_phone, employer_redidential_address, employer_birthday, employer_gender, employer_contact_address, employer_job_number, employer_unsettled_wages, employer_wages_settled, total_order_amount, skill1, skill2, skill3, engaging_services, employer_img, emoliyer_salary from employer where employer_id = #{employerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select employer_id, employer_name, employer_age, employer_phone, employer_redidential_address, employer_birthday, employer_gender, employer_contact_address, employer_job_number, employer_unsettled_wages, employer_wages_settled, total_order_amount, skill1, skill2, skill3, engaging_services, employer_img, emoliyer_salary from employer
